summary: Implements a high‑performance text‑to‑image generation pipeline based on a parallelized Stable Diffusion model, coordinating VAE encoding/decoding, CLIP text encoding, UNet denoising, scheduler stepping, and optional safety checking.
business_intent: Enable developers and products to create high‑quality images from natural language prompts quickly and safely, with support for model customization (LoRA, textual inversion) and streamlined loading of checkpoint files.
